We all love a trip down to our local cafe, cups of tea,...
...a bit of cake and some sheep.
A little cafe in South Korea has its own unique way of attracting new people,...
...two sheep that can be petted by customers.
According to the lunar calendar, February 19th this year...
...marks the start of the year of the sheep...
...and the young couple at the cafe said...
...it was a convenient alternative to visiting a sheep ranch.
The owner of the cafe said he opened up in 2011...
...but the place has never been busier.
In South Korea, the sheep symbolizes kindness, humility and respect for parents.
